profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.4 Transparency - Fill alpha
profile.description: The following keys, if present in an ExtGState object, shall have the values shown: ca - 1.0
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The following keys, if present in an ExtGState object, shall have the values shown: CA - 1.0

error.message: An ExtGState dictionary contains the ca key (fill alpha) with a value other than 1.0
